question: India Young Scientist Programme (Yuvika-2019) was a summer vacation residential programme inaugurated in May 2019 at Bengaluru, Karnataka. Which organisation launched this programme?
option2: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research
explanation: India Young Scientist Programme (Yuvika-2019) was a summer vacation residential programme inaugurated in May 2019 at Bengaluru, Karnataka. Indian Space Research Organisation launched this programme. Yuvika Program is primarily aimed at imparting basic knowledge on Space Technology, Space Science and Space Applications to the younger ones with the intent of arousing their interest in the emerging areas of Space activities.
